Token.Abstract: Performs a selector on a target when executed, optionally with an object as parameter. Finishes instantaneously.
The selector to perform. The selector takes no parameters.

Parameter.Name: selector
Parameter.Abstract: The selector to perform. The selector takes no parameters.

Parameter.Name: target
Parameter.Abstract: The receiver that will performs the selector.

Token.Abstract: The selector to perform. The selector takes a single parameter of type id.

Parameter.Name: selector
Parameter.Abstract: The selector to perform. The selector takes a single parameter of type id.

Parameter.Name: target
Parameter.Abstract: The receiver that will performs the selector.

Parameter.Name: object
Parameter.Abstract: The object passed to the selector as parameter.
